translated: I was still a trainee, my mind not yet attained.

original: cetaso paṇidhī ahu.🔽Nāsissaṁ na pivissāmi,🔽vihārato na nikkhame;
analyzed: cetasaḥ paṇidhī ahu  na asissam na pivissāmi  vihārataḥ na nikkhame
translated: I made a resolution in my mind.🔽I wouldn’t eat or drink;🔽I wouldn’t leave my dwelling.
I wouldn’t lie down even if I saw
the arrow of craving lodged in me.
While I was living like this,
I have attained the three knowledges;
I have done the Buddha’s bidding.”
